title: "The Unexpected Gift of Uncertainty in Your Bible Study" With Amy Carroll
itunes:title: "The Unexpected Gift of Uncertainty in Your Bible Study" With Amy Carroll
description:
It's easy to seek certainty when life feels unpredictable and out of control. But what if uncertainty leads us closer to God?
 
 On today's episode, our dear friend, Proverbs 31 writer and author, Amy Carroll challenges us to embrace uncertainty because we learn how to better trust and seek God. Through her "clarity principle," she walks us through a three-step Bible study technique when we're seeking answers in the middle of uncertain seasons. This principle is one you'll want to save for later, so grab a pen and paper to take notes!

 Related Resources:

- Subscribe to receive free Encouragement for Today weekday devotions in your inbox.
- Make sure you get a copy of Amy's newest Bible study, Esther:
 Seeing Our Invisible God in an Uncertain World, co-author Lynn Cowell.
- Connect with Amy on Instagram @amydohmcarroll
